Description:
Job Responsibility:Preventive Maintenance of Medium Voltage and Low Voltage Switchgear, Transformers.
Ability to read electrical drawings and troubleshoot switchgear systems.
Testing of Various relays (Distance, Differential and Overcurrent)
Operation of testing kits like Omicron and Freja.
Preparation of investigation reports, fault findings and corrective measures.
Willing to work in a shift pattern and a good team player.Skills
Skills: Candidate must have a Railway Mobility background
Industry:           Traction Power (33kV & 750V DC) System Railway Industry or Sub-station Industry
